pageProps.content:
Experience

Located on Thesen Island in Knysna Lagoon, The Turbine Boutique Hotel is unique in every way. This converted power station is now an upscale boutique hotel with a unique look & feel.
All the original machinery has been integrated into the design of the hotel to remind guests of its glorious past.
With an exceptional on-site restaurant that serves fresh Knysna oysters, as well as a lovely viewing deck & Tapas Bar, The Turbine Boutique Hotel does not disappoint when it comes to dining.
In fact, guests can also enjoy sundowner cruises on the hotel’s private pontoon boat while watching the sun sets over the quiet lagoon.

Stay

The Turbine Boutique Hotel features 17 standard rooms, 6 luxury rooms, 2 self-catering suites & a honeymoon suite.
The standard rooms include air-conditioning & en-suite bathrooms. Each luxury room includes a relaxing lounge area while the honeymoon suite boasts a lounge & entertainment area as well as beautiful views over the Knysna Lagoon’s waterways. The self-catering suites are similar to the honeymoon suite, but also include an open-plan kitchen.
Hotel facilities include a restaurant, bar, library, gym, pool & wellness spa.

Activities

Knysna offers a variety of fun-filled Garden Route activities.
Some of these include boating, canoeing, fishing, hiking or romantic sunset cruises. Other exciting options include waterskiing, motorized water sports, kite surfing & mountain bike trips. Golf & shopping excursions to nearby markets are also popular pastimes.
Ferry rides to the nearby Featherbed Nature Reserve with its ancient caves & sandy coves should also be added to the list. And visits to the famous Knysna Heads are a must.
Guests can also do a day trip to Plettenberg Bay to visit the Elephant Sanctuary or go zip lining through the forest. Seasonal whale watching can also be arranged.

subfolders.title: Christiana Lodge
subfolders.description: Christiana Lodge is a classic beach house situated only a 5-minute walk from the renowned Robberg Beach in the coastal town of Plettenberg Bay. This west-facing Garden Route lodge offers individually-styled rooms with private decks & sensational sunsets.   Owner-managed & run, Christiana Lodge is all about service where hands-on hosting & friendly staff display true South African hospitality.

subfolders.title: Emily Moon River Lodge
subfolders.description: Surrounded by indigenous vegetation, with views of the surrounding wetland, winding river & distant mountains, Emily Moon River Lodge in Plettenberg Bay offers a true nature experience. The lodge overlooks the southern bank of the Bitou River & from its beautiful, contemporary rooms, guests can soak up sensational river views. Emily Moon has a long list of activities on their recommendation list, including mountain biking, horse-riding, canoeing & scenic nature walks.

subfolders.title: Head Over Hills
subfolders.description: Perched on the edge of the iconic Knysna Heads, the five-star Head Over Hills Luxury Retreat boasts spectacular views of the surrounding ocean & mountains. This award-winning retreat has taken many prizes for its superb location, including the Prime Location Hotel in South Africa by the prestigious Haute Grandeur – indeed, a wonderful achievement. With world-class views & luxurious interiors, Head Over Hills is the ideal choice for honeymooners or couples looking for a well-deserved vacation.

subfolders.title: Hog Hollow Country Lodge
subfolders.description: Hog Hollow Country Lodge is situated in a private nature reserve near Plettenberg Bay - one of the Garden Route’s most beautiful beachside towns.   The estate boasts magnificent views of the surrounding valleys & Tsitsikamma Mountains, & is situated alongside a central dam, creating a private oasis on the edge of an indigenous forest. Hog Hollow is famous for its friendly, personalized service & warm hospitality.  From the moment you arrive, until the moment you leave – the staff is happy to go the extra mile, ensuring you the most memorable stay.

subfolders.title: Hunters Country House
subfolders.description: Hunters Country House is an original thatched homestead, set among beautiful gardens, against the backdrop of the majestic Tsitsikamma Mountains in the heart of the Garden Route.   This peaceful & tranquil retreat is the ideal place from which to explore the Garden Route as it is a short drive from Plettenberg Bay & the popular town of Knysna. Hunters Country House is a member of the Relais & Chateaux group & provides exceptional service & attention to detail.

subfolders.title: Kanonkop House
subfolders.description: The luxurious Kanonkop House is perched on a hill above the beautiful Garden Route town of Knysna & offers captivating views of the lagoon & the iconic Knysna Heads. This well-appointed guesthouse is located near the centre of town & is, therefore, an ideal base from which to explore Knysna & the surrounding area of the Garden Route.   Owner-managed & run, guests can be confident that they will receive impeccable, personalized service with great attention to detail while still maintaining a relaxed home-away-from-home atmosphere.

subfolders.title: Knysna Hollow Country Estate
subfolders.description: Set in a tranquil country estate near Knysna Lagoon, the elegant Knysna Hollow Country Estate offers a relaxed space just minutes from the centre of this pretty seaside town. The estate offers sensational views of the famous Knysna Heads, 2 large rocky headlands that stick out over the channel between the Indian Ocean & the Knysna Estuary. This modern Cape Country Manor House offers the ideal base from which to explore Knysna & the surrounding area of the Garden Route, including its rich forests, endless lakes & gorgeous beaches.

subfolders.title: Kurland
subfolders.description: Kurland is an elegant country hotel set on a private polo estate between Knysna & Plettenberg Bay along the renowned Garden Route. Family-owned & run, Kurland is all about exceptional service, beautiful suites, sublime local cuisine & family-friendly activities, including horse-riding & quad biking on the estate. With an ideal location in the heart of the Garden Route, guests will be close to some of the area’s top attractions, including The Elephant Sanctuary, Birds of Eden, Monkeyland & the beautiful Nature’s Valley with its scenic forest trails.

subfolders.title: Leisure Isle Lodge
subfolders.description: Situated on a tiny island in Knysna Lagoon, right at the heart of the Garden Route, you will find Leisure Isle Lodge – a charming guesthouse that sits alongside cosy beach cottages. Offering beautiful views of the Knysna Lagoon, the elegant restaurant & outdoor pool area is a wonderful place to relax in the sun after a day of exploration. This intimate guesthouse offers great service, along with a friendly home-away-from-home atmosphere that attracts couples, friends & families alike.

subfolders.title: No 5 Boutique Art Hotel
subfolders.description: Nr 5 Boutique Art Hotel is set within an upscale neighbourhood in Port Elizabeth, an easy stroll from Summerstrand – one of the best beaches in the area.   Small & intimate, this boutique hotel offers friendly & personalized service & a variety of modern facilities such as a wellness spa, a fitness centre & a restaurant serving fine cuisine. This hotel offers relaxation for mind & body.  Guests can stroll through the landscaped gardens or along the beach – especially after a lengthy self-drive vacation along the scenic Garden Route.

subfolders.title: Pezula Resort Hotel & Spa
subfolders.description: Pezula Resort Hotel & Spa is an award-winning golf resort with a dramatic location set on a cliff overlooking the beautiful Knysna lagoon to the north & the Outeniqua Mountains in the distance. The resort is home to an 18-hole Pezula Championship Golf Course & offers a range of other family-friendly activities like horse-riding, tennis, cycling, mountain biking while yachting, kayaking, diving & fishing can also be arranged. Pezula’s exceptional on-site restaurants offer delicious cuisine that ranges from beach picnics to light meals & sophisticated dining.

subfolders.title: Radisson Blu Hotel Port Elizabeth
subfolders.description: The Radisson Blu Hotel Port Elizabeth is situated only 300 meters from the blue flag beaches of Algoa Bay – widely regarded as boasting some of the best beaches in the country & a paradise for watersport enthusiasts. Port Elizabeth is more than just their beaches.  The seaside town is home to a variety of good restaurants, museums & monuments as well as a wonderful overnight destination after a Garden Route holiday or en-route to Addo Elephant Park. Guests can enjoy rejuvenating treatments at the wellness spa or take a dip in the gorgeous swimming pool overlooking the beach.

subfolders.title: Tamodi Lodge & Stables
subfolders.description: Tamodi Lodge enjoys an idyllic setting on a working equestrian farm within a private nature reserve just outside the sought-after seaside town of Plettenberg Bay. Here, guests will enjoy jaw-dropping views of the surrounding mountains in a serene setting.   Just around the corner & a short drive away, you will find Plettenberg Bay with its blue flag beaches & a long list of activities, including seasonal whale watching, water sports, golf & wine tasting.

subfolders.title: The Plettenberg
subfolders.description: Perched high on a rocky headland, overlooking the golden Formosa Beach in Plettenberg Bay, the sophisticated & intimate beach hotel promises captivating & uninterrupted views of the ocean below. The Plettenberg is perfectly situated to some of the area’s best beaches, including the ever-popular Central Beach as well as blue flag Robberg Beach.  Excellent whale watching can be experienced here between August to December each year. Apart from their award-winning seafood restaurant & stylish bar as well as an on-site wellness spa & 2 heated infinity pools, The Plettenberg also caters for younger guests.  Children can enjoy a range of exciting activities like bodyboarding, beach tennis, popcorn & movies or interactive cooking lessons with a friendly chef.  Babysitting is also available.

subfolders.title: The Rex Hotel
subfolders.description: Situated in Knysna’s trendy Grey Street – a thoroughfare lined with cafes, restaurants & boutiques, you will find The Rex Hotel. Just around the corner, the Knysna Waterfront invites guests to browse, shop or dine to their hearts’ content & return to their quiet slice of paradise tucked away in a remote corner of this seaside town. Their on-site restaurant serves mouth-watering breakfast options & delectable Mediterranean cuisine – the perfect dining option after a day of Garden Route exploration.

subfolders.title: The Turbine Boutique Hotel
subfolders.description: Located on Thesen Island in Knysna Lagoon, The Turbine Boutique Hotel is unique in every way.  This converted power station is now an upscale boutique hotel with a unique look & feel.   All the original machinery has been integrated into the design of the hotel to remind guests of its glorious past. With an exceptional on-site restaurant that serves fresh Knysna oysters, as well as a lovely viewing deck & Tapas Bar, The Turbine Boutique Hotel does not disappoint when it comes to dining.

subfolders.title: The Windermere
subfolders.description: Set in the upscale suburb of Humewood, close to the prestigious Humewood Golf Club & Port Elizabeth Airport, you will find The Windermere – a contemporary boutique hotel with direct access to King’s Beach. The boutique hotel is within walking distance to the endless blue flag beaches & independent eateries, & The Boardwalk can also be found nearby. Since there are only a small number of suites at The Windermere, personalized service & warm South African hospitality awaits.

subfolders.title: Tsala Treetop Lodge
subfolders.description: Tsala Treetop Lodge, as the name suggests, is located within a magnificent forest along South Africa’s ever-popular Garden Route.   The Tsitsikamma Forest boasts beautiful nature walks & is a short drive away from Plettenberg Bay, where you can enjoy white, sandy beaches & outstanding restaurants. Tsala is our childhood dream come true.  Set in a lush forest, exclusive treetop suites with private plunge pools offer jaw-dropping views over the beautiful surroundings.

whatWeLoveItems: Ideal setting on Thesen Island in Knysna Lagoon
Old power station turned upscale boutique hotel
Sundowner cruises on the hotel’s private pontoon boat
